en-US.title: Truesdale Medical Center
en-US.description: Committed to providing LGBTQ+ inclusive healthcare services, Truesdale Medical Center ensures a safe, respectful, and understanding atmosphere where patients can freely discuss their needs. The medical center specifically emphasizes healthcare for transgender patients with services such as gender-affirming care and mental health support. Their team of professionals are known for their compassionate and informative approach to medical care.

address: 6296 Rivers Ave STE 310, North Charleston, SC 294064973, USA
